description.displayText: Jess is an incredible nanny and cook! Her meals are healthy and delicious for everyone in the family. With Jessica's help, my son's diet now consists of so many healthy foods he refused to try before! I'm so glad to have found her, highly recommend!!
description.originalText: Jess is an incredible nanny and cook! Her meals are healthy and delicious for everyone in the family. With Jessica's help, my son's diet now consists of so many healthy foods he refused to try before! I'm so glad to have found her, highly recommend!!

description.displayText:
Jessica has been doing food prep for us for about six months now and we couldn't be happier! She is perceptive, thorough, organized and Super proactive- It's so nice to not have to answer a million questions while I'm busy with my 3 kids :) If there is a question and she sees I'm not available, she just makes a decision and let's me know later. And I really appreciate this.
She comes in after lunch and gets the kitchen clean,  organized and ready for dinner. Then, she will perfectly chop and dice and slice any vegetables I might need for cooking that night or the next day. She prepares amazing sauces and dressings and anything else I need or want. 
In addition to food prepping, she has done grocery shopping and even watched the kids for us when we needed. Her flexibility is a huge asset, and her positive attitude adds to the environment for the kids. 
To sum it up, Jessica is timely, efficient, and resourceful in finding ways to provide value, and I'd highly recommend her services.

description.displayText: Jessica worked for our family for a little over 3 years.  We were looking for a high energy, qualified applicant to assist our family of 5 on a part time basis . Jessica's responsibilities included lots of driving to/ from after school activities, preparing healthy balanced meals, some light housekeeping and when we got a new puppy - dog care as well. Jessica is a hard working individual who would be an asset to any busy household.
